thread.title: Professor Sweater
thread.title_full: Rush Order Tees reviewed by Professor Sweater

author: Professor Sweater
title: Professor Sweater
text: My band needed shirts fast for an upcoming music event. Here comes Julie, cape and all, to save the day! Not only did we get a shipping discount, she also helped us find the right shirt for our budget. I have not seen the final product yet, but based on these other reviews I am sure they will look great!
